input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Slim Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Clear UL listed Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Nordic Spruce Medium Hinged Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7 ft Pre-lit Flocked ?Bennington Fir Artificial Christmas Tree 400 UL listed Clear Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Colorado Mountain Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6' and 3.5' Lighted Palm Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Multicolor ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Concolor Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Entrance Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Flocked Montana Down Swept Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 250 Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 7.5ft Pre-Lit Full Oregon Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Snowy Poechmann Fir Tree with LED Lights'
  - Name='Glitzhome 8' Deluxe Pre-Lit Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch Pre-Lit Full Riverton Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Pre-Lit Artificial Edmonton Fir Light Show Memory Shape Christmas Tree with Instant Connect Technology and Color Changing LED'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6ft. Flocked Colorado Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Warm White Microdot LED Lights with Instant'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='9Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree Dual Color LED Lights By National Tree Company'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Slim Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Clear UL listed Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial fir tree with clear lights, but slimmer Fraser Fir shape, slightly different tree model, fewer lights; broadly similar purpose and category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Nordic Spruce Medium Hinged Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hinged artificial tree from the same brand, but different tree species (Nordic Spruce) and medium size. Similar construction but different silhouette and branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, artificial fir tree but pencil (very slim) silhouette, different from downswept full body of reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and 'Feel Real' downswept Douglas Fir with pre-lit lights, but pencil slim silhouette (less full), different size but similar features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and 'Feel Real' downswept Douglas Fir with pre-lit lights, but pencil slim silhouette (less full), different size but similar features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar downswept Douglas Fir pencil slim, but dual color LED lights differ from clear lights in reference, plus slimmer shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Almost identical product with same height, pre-lit 'Feel Real' technology, downswept Douglas Fir silhouette, full bodied branches and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7 ft Pre-lit Flocked ?Bennington Fir Artificial Christmas Tree 400 UL listed Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial fir tree with clear lights but flocked finish and different fir species and slightly smaller size; different texture and appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Colorado Mountain Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and pre-lit artificial fir tree with natural look; different brand and fir species but similar construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6' and 3.5' Lighted Palm Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Not relevant; completely different tree species (palm) and silhouette, no similarity to fir tree product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Multicolor ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and downswept Douglas Fir with 'Feel Real' and hinged branches, shorter height and multicolor lights rather than clear, but otherwise similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Concolor Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree from same brand but 'Snowy' (flocked) different finish and different fir species (Concolor Fir), less indication of downswept or pre-lit features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Entrance Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand fir tree but different model (Dunhill Fir), likely different shape and not specified pre-lit or downswept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Flocked Montana Down Swept Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 250 Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar downswept silhouette and height, pre-lit with clear LED lights, but different species (spruce) and flocked texture.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 7.5ft Pre-Lit Full Oregon Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar full artificial fir tree pre-lit with clear lights and comparable height, different brand and fir species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree with slim silhouette from same brand but different species (Fraser) and no pre-lit indication, less relevant in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Snowy Poechmann Fir Tree with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir from same brand in 'Snowy' finish and different species with LED lights, not downswept or 'Feel Real' indicated.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 8' Deluxe Pre-Lit Flocked Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit taller artificial fir with flocked finish from different brand, similar type but different look and construction details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit 'Feel Real' downswept Douglas Fir with pencil slim shape; similar technology but slimmer silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit 'Feel Real' downswept Douglas Fir with pencil slim shape; similar technology but slimmer silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch Pre-Lit Full Riverton Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full pre-lit artificial fir tree with 'Real Touch' realism technology; similar type but different brand and fir species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Pre-Lit Artificial Edmonton Fir Light Show Memory Shape Christmas Tree with Instant Connect Technology and Color Changing LED
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree, but with color changing LEDs and light show features making it a more novelty product; different technology and species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6ft. Flocked Colorado Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Warm White Microdot LED Lights with Instant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height artificial fir tree with flocked finish and many warm LED lights, but different species and finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree Dual Color LED Lights By National Tree Company
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar downswept Douglas Fir pre-lit tree with dual color LEDs and taller height, same brand and construction, differing mainly in light color and size.
